project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement a function to read the text file and preprocess the text (remove punctuation, convert to lowercase).
Implement a function to count the frequency of each word in the preprocessed text.
Implement a function to find the top 10 most common words from the frequency count.
Implement a function to display the result in the terminal.
Write tests for each of the functions above to ensure they work correctly.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
